title: Using tooltips in unexpected ways
description:
Highcharts tooltips are one of most underated features. In the tooltips you
can easily render html, that means we can put images, tables even charts. 
So the possibilities are almost limitless.

title: Giving a Thematic Touch to your Interactive Chart
description: A short description of the post.

title: Thematic Interactive Map
description:
Last week all the _rstatsosphere_ see the beautiful swiss map from 
[Timo Grossenbacher](https://timogrossenbacher.ch)  [work](https://timogrossenbacher.ch/2016/12/beautiful-thematic-maps-with-ggplot2-only/) using 
ggplot2. Now is the turn of highcharter.

title: rchess a Chess Package for R
description: Finally R have a chess package!
